post.body: Lol I AM the dishwasher here!!! I WISH I had one :| (do boyfriends count as dishwashers? LOL)
Fell asleep making cookies!! So this holiday we have sugar cookies, gingersnaps and ones with my face print in them. LOL I wont serve those
Ate too much pizza is FINALLY making Christmas cookies...crap I need milk...may run to the store here soon
Went out to get pizza (mmmm) came home to clean dishes YAY for Mr. Joy, he just earned brownie points!!! :D
Seriously doesnt want to do the dishes...how much does it cost to hire a maid?? LOL
trying to figure out what Twitter is...still new at this, never heard of it before, give me grace :)
